mapper.insert: insert into lre_server.session_info (session_id, client_id, session_content, lre_result, create_time) values (#{sessionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sessionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lreResult,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select session_id, client_id, session_content, lre_result, create_time from lre_server.session_info

select session_id, client_id, session_content, lre_result, create_time from lre_server.session_info where client_id in (select client_id from lre_server.user_client where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
and session_id like concat('%',#{sessionInfo.sessionId},'%')
and session_id like concat('%',#{sessionInfo.clientId},'%')
and lre_result = #{sessionInfo.lreResult,jdbcType=TINYINT}
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{sessionInfo.startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{sessionInfo.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
order by create_time desc
